title.rendered: Eldorado Stone Quoted, Featured in Ocean Home Magazine

content.rendered:
Ocean Home Magazine publishes insight and images of luxury pools and outdoor settings in its monthly magazine, and in the April 2016 issue, the coastal lifestyle publication featured our Signature Kitchens as well as insight from Eldorado Stone about outdoor living trends. In the “Breathing Space” article, Ocean Home magazine writes, “A handsome rooftop setting by Eldorado Stone…creates calm and welcoming outdoor spaces,” and Eldorado Stone Vice President of Marketing and Product Development Ramsay Hawfield is quoted saying, “Outdoor living spaces are no longer a simple trend in the industry; they’re part of a lifestyle.”

Learn more about our Signature Kitchens here.
